VCUarts Internship

The first image here was made as a mailing for donations for scholarships in VCUarts. This was one of the most successful donation mailings in VCUarts, pulling in thousands in donations. The second image was made as a poster which was displayed at VCUarts events. The last two images were made as drafts for an invitation and an email header for a fashion ≈broadcasting event for VCUarts.
